name: Death by Disassembly
description:
Made as a challenge for myself in 10 days, You play as a skull on a quest to find something that most don't seek: themselves!

Is the game too slow? try downloading the desktop version.

Made by:
  • Peter (@png103),  Concept, Coding, Art, Music, Level Design
  • MaskGuy (@FiendishMaskGuy), Level Design and Art
  • Carmo (@carmoule), Title screen/Thumbnail art
  • Skywrooth (@Skywrooth), Helped with some coding and some design
